name: JeuMeDeplace - a Mario Maker style platformer
name_original: JeuMeDeplace - a Mario Maker style platformer
description:
Hey,

This is basicly my take on mario maker. It is an early build, and you can build and play level you create. 

You can add as many textures you want to create the perfect level!

You can share your levels by giving your files to somebody else (not very convenient but it's alright)

It is all in french but I think you english people can manage to use it. (btw when you play the game, put your keyboard in azerty because baguette)

YOU MUST HAVE JAVA 8 ON YOUR COMPUTER

Thanks for downloading!
